EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Carla Franklin (1343398495.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Carla, Not yet…they are still working on it. As soon as I have it I will send it your way. Thanks!Sara From: C. Franklin [mailto:carlafranklin@gmail.com] Sent: Friday, July 27, 2012 10:06 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: SOW: Carla Franklin Hey Sara,
Have you gotten any the SOW or confirmed the fee information from BTG?---------------------------------------------------------------- Carla FranklinOn Thu, Jul 26, 2012 at 3:36 PM, C. Franklin <carlafranklin@gmail.com <mailto:carlafranklin@gmail.com>> wrote:OK. Sounds good.---------------------------------------------------------------- Carla FranklinOn Thu, Jul 26, 2012 at 1:48 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:FYI…I will let you know when I receive the statement for work so we can review that before I sign. Thanks!Sara From: Sara Conde Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2012 1:48 PM To: 'Patricia Petersen'; Amelia Tyagi Cc: Steve Arhancet Subject: RE: Carla Franklin Hi Patricia, Thank you for getting back to me on this so quickly. I have attached an updated MSA with all of BTG’s information and my signature. Please sign and return via email. The SOW description can be something generic just like you write below. Project management services to be provided to a BTG client" would be fine. Yes, I spoke to Carla again this morning and she is ready to move forward with MBO. Thank you!Sara ___________________________________ SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514v3XMqz5mifTf5aIualuAPnjwdwq2ER7fPjIKk76mJ1SE58%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514v3XMqz5mifTf5aIualuAPnjwdwq2ER7fPjIKk76mJ1SE58%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514v3XMqz5mifTf5aIualuAPnjwdwq2ER7fPjIKk76mJ1SE58%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Patricia Petersen [mailto:patricia.petersen@businesstalentgroup.com] <mailto:[mailto:patricia.petersen@businesstalentgroup.com]> Sent: Thursday, July 26, 2012 12:59 PM To: Amelia Tyagi; Sara Conde Cc: Steve Arhancet Subject: RE: Carla Frankelin Hi Sara, I have reviewed the standard MBO templates and they look fine to me. My question for the SOW, I presume in the "Description of Services" there we would either include quite specific information about the particular project at hand, or is the usual practice to simply enter the generic "Project management services to be provided to a BTG client" ... please give me a bit of guidance here. The SOW I see can complete on line, but the MSA is a pdf so I think you need to fill in the blank lines - please confirm. Finally, can I assume that Carla has decided to engage via MBO, so we can go ahead on this basis? Thanks,Pat. Patricia Petersen Business Talent Group LLC 954.232.4024 <tel:954.232.4024> Cell 212.537.4050 <tel:212.537.4050> e-Fax patricia.petersen@businesstalentgroup.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:patricia.petersen@businesstalentgroup.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514v3XMqz5mifTf5aIualuAPnjwdwq2ER7fPjIKk76mJ1SE58%3D> From: Amelia Tyagi Sent: Wednesday, July 25, 2012 3:12 PM To: Sara Conde; Patricia Petersen Cc: Steve Arhancet; carlafranklin@gmail.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:carlafranklin@gmail.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514v3XMqz5mifTf5aIualuAPnjwdwq2ER7fPjIKk76mJ1SE58%3D> Subject: Re: Carla FrankelinThank you Sara. I am cc'ing our counsel, Pat Petersen on this -- Pat will take a look at the standard contracts and will get back to you about best way to move forward on contracting. Thanks! Amelia Warren Tyagi President Business Talent Group LLC New York | Los Angeles | San Francisco | Austin Business Talent Group LLC 310 882 5460 x 502 <tel:310%20882%205460%20x%20502> phone 310 882 5470 <tel:310%20882%205470> fax amelia.tyagi@businesstalentgroup.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:amelia.tyagi@businesstalentgroup.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514v3XMqz5mifTf5aIualuAPnjwdwq2ER7fPjIKk76mJ1SE58%3D> On Jul 25, 2012, at 3:07 PM, Sara Conde wrote: Hi Amelia, I had a lovely call with Carla (copied above) thank you for introducing us. We were able to walk through the program and we have another call scheduled at 10:30am tomorrow morning to go over a cash flow estimate. Barring anything unforeseen, it looks like Carla will be moving forward with the program so we will need to execute the agreement between BTG and MBO. The following links provide our standard agreement <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_MSA_Template.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514v3XMqz5mifTf5aIualuAPnjwdwq2ER7fPjIKk76mJ1SE58%3D> and statement of work <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Exec_SOW.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514v3XMqz5mifTf5aIualuAPnjwdwq2ER7fPjIKk76mJ1SE58%3D> we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. If you would prefer to work with your own agreement, that is totally fine, please send that over for us to reivew. Looking forward to working with you and Carla! Have a wonderful evening,Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: 703.793.6028 <tel:703.793.6028>f: 703.793.6068 <tel:703.793.6068>e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCelxcuU53peiAI67kvzfVaZGmvq9uHfbq18Eq3lpxZ%2FyBO07i&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514v3XMqz5mifTf5aIualuAPnjwdwq2ER7fPjIKk76mJ1SE58%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCa1BNp0514v3XMqz5mifTf5aIualuAPnjwdwq2ER7fPjIKk76mJ1SE58%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
